name: Rover Come Over
description:
A mysterious robot has landed on your planet from outer space! As an engineer, you take great interest in being its friend. If only everyone else felt the same way...

Dodge bullets and keep the rover out of danger. You are immune to electric attacks, and the rover is immune to bullets. Channel electricity to perform more powerful moves.

Controls:

WASD: Move

Left shift: Dash

Left click: Attack

Right click: Ping rover

Space: Channel electricity
